title: Matthew Robinson (footballer, born 1984)
text:
Matthew Robinson (born 22 March 1984 in <a href="Ipswich">Ipswich</a>, <a href="Suffolk">Suffolk</a>, England) is an <a href="English%20people">English</a> <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a> who played as a midfielder in the <a href="Football%20League">Football League</a>.
Career.
Robinson came through the <a href="youth%20team">youth team</a> of <a href="Ipswich%20Town%20F.C.">Ipswich Town</a> and made 11 appearances scoring 12 goals for the youth team in the 2001–02 season.<ref name="Youth (U18/U19) Results & Match Reports"></ref> However, he failed to make a first team appearance at <a href="Portman%20Road">Portman Road</a> and he signed non-contract terms at <a href="Football%20League%20One">Football League One</a> side <a href="A.F.C.%20Bournemouth">Bournemouth</a>, but was released after a month. He then signed for <a href="Football%20League%20Two">Football League Two</a> team <a href="Cambridge%20United%20F.C.">Cambridge United</a> in February 2004. He played nine first team for United, but was released in January 2005, and joined local neighbours <a href="Cambridge%20City%20F.C.">Cambridge City</a>.
